column4: News;Phnom Penh: On the evening of September 26
column6: a group of black men argued with each other and violence flared up. One person was injured in the left arm. ------The authorities intervened at the restaurant Obieze at Street T.34  in Chamkamorn.------A man was stabbed with a knife during the argument and was sent to Russian Hospital.------Both sides were then taken in for questioning and their passport
column7: visa and employment situation is being investigated.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/262422------ ------ ------
